name: ##socialanalysis channel policy
body:
### Preliminary policy The preliminary policy is intended to shape some basic rules which aid in creating a respectful and relaxed channel atmosphere.
  • Be respectful to others
  • Take into consideration other people's concerns regarding persistent bias or non-understanding
  • Since the channel is intended for discussion, it would be helpful if people didn't post links exclusively, without having ideas or opinions on the subject
## IRC connection details 
 server: irc.freenode.org
 channel: ##socialanalysis
## Suggested irc clients
  • mirc
  • http://webchat.freenode.org
  • weechat
  • irssi
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
